SELECT t.hospital_id, t.dept_id, t1.doctor_name, t1.doctor_code, t1.field, t1.doctor_intro, t1.positional, t2.receive_num FROM hospital_dept t LEFT JOIN hospital_register_doctor t1 ON t.dept_id = t1.dept_id LEFT JOIN hospital_receive_log t2 ON (t.hospital_id = t2.hospital_id AND t1.doctor_code=t2.doctor_code)
order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
dept_id desc

SELECT DISTINCT t.`week`, CONCAT( date_format(t.duty_dtime, '%m-%d'), '|', CASE t.`week` WHEN 1 THEN '周一' WHEN 2 THEN '周二' WHEN 3 THEN '周三' WHEN 4 THEN '周四' WHEN 5 THEN '周五' WHEN 6 THEN '周六' WHEN 7 THEN '周日' ELSE '未知' END ) AS worktimeWeek FROM hospital_doctor_duty t LEFT JOIN hospital_register_doctor t1 ON (t1.dept_id = t.dept_id AND t1.doctor_code = t.doctor_code) LEFT JOIN hospital_dept t2 ON ( t2.hospital_id = t.hospital_id AND t2.dept_id = t.dept_id AND t2.dept_id = t1.dept_id )
order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
week ASC

SELECT t.hospital_id, t.dept_id, t1.doctor_name, t1.doctor_code, t1.field, t1.doctor_intro, t1.positional, t2.id as hospital_doctor_duty_id, t2.week, t2.plan, t2.order_num, t2.duty_dtime FROM hospital_dept t LEFT JOIN hospital_register_doctor t1 ON t.dept_id = t1.dept_id LEFT JOIN hospital_doctor_duty t2 ON (t.hospital_id = t2.hospital_id AND t.dept_id = t2.dept_id AND t1.doctor_code=t2.doctor_code)
order by
${paramMap.orderCol}
week ASC, plan ASC
